chunks.text:
etail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION (RE-OPENING) | GUESS Boutique at Dubai Marina Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the re-opening of GUESS - Dubai Marina Mall- Boutique

 

The store was temporary closed for renovation and has re-opened its doors to Guests starting 10th November 2024 at 10 AM.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team @Majdi Elhakam <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com>  @Olga Bakhareva <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com>  @Guess Dubai Marina Mall <mailto:Guess.DubaiMarinaMall@chalhoub.com>  @Milovan Micevic <mailto:Milovan.Micevic@chalhoub.com>  @Foyzul Choudhury <mailto:Foyzul.Choudhury@chalhoub.com>  
*	Admin @Maitha Alhashmi <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  @Rami Riman <mailto:Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>  @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Rauf <mailto:Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com>  @Gayasuddin Mirza <mailto:Gayasuddin.Mirza@chalhoub.com> 
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  
*	Government Affairs @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>  @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d @Sooraj Kannu <mailto:Sooraj.Kannu@3d-consultants.com>  @Imad Salloum <mailto:Imad.Salloum@3d-consultants.com>  @Chadi Dagher <mailto:Chadi.Dagher@3d-consultants.com> 
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> .
